name: Ludo Shooter
description:
Ludo Shooter is a turn-based board game where the player can play classic as well as a Ludo shooter game where the player can shoot others with the weapon received from crate drops along Ludo-map.

# Features
* player can use special dices.
* player can receive random weapons from crates that are dropped on the Ludo map.
* There Types of drops dropped on the map
1, Weapon Crate
2, Landmine
3, Medi-Kit.

Ludo Shooter can be played by you and your family and friends. However, you can also play with computer-players.

*This game supports offline multiplayer.
*note - online multiplayer may be supported in the future.
